product_name: Profile T2 Plus Cobra Carbon Aerobars
long_description: Featuring a high level of adjustability and carbon fiber construction, the Profile T2 Plus Cobra Carbon aerobars let you perfectly dial in your aero position for your races against the clock.
short_description: Featuring a high level of adjustability and carbon fiber construction, the Profile T2 Plus Cobra Carbon aerobars let you perfectly dial in your aero position for your races against the clock.
